<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞笑着露出一口大白牙：“我也相信，还要感谢唐哥你，要不是你，这事成不了，而且你还要担风险。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">唐彪挥挥手道：“这点风险算什么，要做事，哪有不担风险的？要是你的电影爆了，我还能得到政绩，跟着风光一把，而且，我们科每年都有宣传指标，不过是占用一个名额的事儿，不用也浪费了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞很诚恳：“总而言之，谢谢唐哥了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“害，说什么谢！对了！”，唐彪转头问起别的话题，“你那几个案子，什么时候开庭？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">那不是几个，那是上千个。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞道：“都集中在一两个月后，其中还有一些在拍电影期间。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">唐彪担忧：“那你时间上来得及吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞道：“除了品牌方和张娇的案子，网友那些案子我都请了委托人。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">按照当前世界的法律，原则上原告在法院开庭时应当出席，但是在一些特殊情况下，原告可以通过书面委托代理人出庭，代表原告进行诉讼活动。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">唐彪道：“那就好，走，我们去吃饭。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">次日，成丞辞别了唐彪，跟贝雷帽回到了帝京。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">剧组其他人，已经开足马力，进入了电影的前期筹备，成丞的第一个一千万，也打到了公用的银行卡里，作为电影拍摄的第一笔资金。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">修整了两天后，租了一个场地，7月6号，选角面试正式开始了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">帝京电影学院，宿舍。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“小苟儿，你没搞错吧？”，汪红急得大叫，“你为什么去面试成丞的电影啊！他现在在圈内什么风评你不知道啊？都臭了、烂了！你演他的电影，你后半辈子可能就毁了，你有没有考虑过这个问题？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿清白的脸上不为所动，她收拾东西出门，道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“虽然成丞的风评不太好，但我认为每个人都有改变和成长的可能性，而且我去了也不是答应出演了，我也要面试他的，红红，我会对自己负责的，你不用为我担心。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">汪红急道：“可是，你就不应该去啊！你明明有更好的机会。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿制止了她，道：“这就是一次机会！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">某话剧团。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“阳哥，你真的要去试成丞的戏，不再考虑一下吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“不用考虑了。”，李阳在镜子前站定，整理了着装。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">李阳曾经是一位大热的电视剧男主角，火的那几年很多综艺都邀请他，一度接近过一线。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但是乍得的财富和名气让他迅速变得骄傲和自负，这也导致了他口碑的崩坏，再加上他当时接戏不挑剧，演了几部大烂片之后迅速败光了自己积累下来的人气和滤镜。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">代言合同被取消，新的剧本也迅速撤回，一时间变得无人问津。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">经过了很长时间的崩溃、失意和自我重建后，他开始接受一些小剧场的演出，通过与戏剧性的角色的接触，重新找回了对表演的热爱。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但多年不在主流圈子，他积累的人脉早就消失了，娱乐圈是出了名的踩低捧高，更没有人给他递剧本，投简历过去也是石沉大海，渺无音讯。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">如今，这还是他投简历第一次收到回复。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">某豪车内，后排。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">一男子手握着手机，大声道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“方哥，不要再劝我了，演网大是赚钱，但是演一辈子也只是个不入流的网大演员，永远被主流瞧不起，永远被轻视，我不知道成丞是不是在耍着玩，但是耍又如何呢？就算是耍！赔上的也只是成丞他自己的希望！他比我们更耍不起！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">只要有万分之一的希望，这部电影能够有个5分以上，一亿以上的票房，就不亏！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">不会再烂的，再烂能有网大烂吗？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">我是网大演员，我在乎这个吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">某火车站。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">一个万年群演手握车票，眺望着车站前广场，踌躇满志。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">某模特公司。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">一个身材姣好的模特，拍完一组照片后，急匆匆离开。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞电影公开选角，这在电影圈子里跟笑话一样的事情，在有些人眼里，却相当的重要……<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">第25章 一一面试<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">房间外，面试的队伍排成了长长的一排。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">考虑到面试的人太多，且部分人是从外地赶过来的，成丞便将面试的时间延长到了两天，但是没想到第一天上午来的人还是那么多。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">不断有人进入房间，也不断有人从房间离开。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">脸上露出或欣喜、或失落、或振奋、或懊恼的表情。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">房间内，布局非常简单。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">一条长桌后面，坐着成丞和贝雷帽。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">桌上摆了几沓表格、文件、剧本，还有贝雷帽的暖水杯，成丞的冰镇快乐水。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">长桌前，只有一个凳子，供给面试的人坐。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">此时，坐在上面的是一个艳丽的女人。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">她穿着一件火红的包臀裙，长腿从裙子的分叉中露出来，显得丰满而浑圆，小腹平坦，胸部鼓胀，整个人坐在那里，曲线十分夸张，惹火而动人。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">浓密黑发披肩而下，微微的卷曲在额前，一双妩媚的双眼半睁半眯的，使她多了一丝慵懒的气质，仿佛对什么都不在意。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞低头看着她的简历。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">她叫温莲，今年26岁，面试女一的演员之一。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞问：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“你以前演过不少的角色？还是童星出道？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“你不知道我？”，温莲有些愕然，旋即就失笑起来，也不知道笑自己更多一些还是笑成丞更多一些，“好吧，你是顶流呢，伱不知道我也正常。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞继续认真的看向她，他还在等她回复。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲稍显无奈，正色了许多，道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“是的，我是童星，演过《双时谣》。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">《双时谣》是一部十年前的情景喜剧，其故事围绕着一对夫妻和他们的两个孩子展开。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">某一天，一位天才科学家发现了一种名为“时空转移装置”的新技术，该装置可以控制时空的移动和扭曲，可是，这个实验装置发生了故障，导致时空出现了扭曲和分裂，使主角一家遇见了平行时空的自己。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">原本的时空中，这个家庭体验着一系列爆笑的家庭生活和喜剧事件。父亲是一个幽默风趣的人，总是给家人带来欢乐，母亲是一位聪明而又勤劳的家庭主妇。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">而另一方的平行时空中，父亲是一个事业心强、成功而又忙碌的人，母亲是一位事业有成的职业女性。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">《双时谣》讲的就是这不同时空，两个家庭的碰撞。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">当时，《双时谣》一经播出便大受欢迎，成为了国民级的热剧，温莲也因此成为了家喻户晓的童星。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">所以说，当前平行时空的文娱作品并不差，十年前能有这脑洞，可见一斑。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞在恶补当前时空知识的时候，了解过这部剧，只是没记得里面的演员。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“你在里面扮演的是谁？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲再次被噎住，道：“我在里面演的是凯琳。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞：“就是女儿？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲：“是女儿。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞：“那这几年为什么没怎么看到你？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">看到温莲嘴角抽搐，已经有骂人的迹象了，未免再刺激到她，贝雷帽凑到成丞耳边，小声讲述起来。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">通过贝雷帽讲述，成丞这才了解到温莲目前的处境。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲童星出道，跟前世的杨紫差不多，是国民女儿，但是温莲立场不如杨紫坚定，一直没有想好是否坚持走演员这条路，高考毕业，也没有选择报考电影学院，后来，她想通了，后悔了，可却也把自己耽误了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">再加上她没有很好的资源，童星想转型也难，出演了几个性感的角色，当年看着她长大的人一时间接受不了，招致了很多批评声。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这五六年来，温莲一直负面评价居多，当时的国民女儿成为了童星转型失败的典型代表。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">不过，她是国民女儿，有这个噱头在，很多节目都乐意邀请她，当然不是为了捧她，而是利用她，这么好的工具人不用白不用。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但是在一款跟前世《演员的诞生》差不多类型的综艺上，面对国内三大导演之一的吕卓峰的批评，温莲选择了怒怼回呛，使得吕卓峰当众下不来台，节目播出后，网上尽是对温莲的批评，一众明星下场，站队吕卓峰。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">随后，吕卓峰更是对圈内放言，要封杀温莲，以至于，她现在无人敢用。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲换了换腿，自嘲道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“你现在知道我的情况了，应该不敢用了我吧？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“为什么不敢用？”，成丞平静道，“你得罪了吕卓峰，又不是得罪了我。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">随后，他将“梁安娜”的个人剧本，也就是金晨饰演的角色的个人完整剧本递给了温莲道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“这是女一的剧本，你通过试镜了，把联系方式留一下，过几天会有工作人员通知你进组。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲不可思议：“这就通过试镜了？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">她还什么都没做呢。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">贝雷帽也有些傻眼，看着成丞，觉得他未免有些草率了，连试镜都不试的嘛？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞一副理所当然的样子：“还要怎样？我觉得不会有谁比你更适合梁安娜这个角色了，而且你有演戏经验，当然了，你要想演一段，也可以。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲发问：“可是你不怕得罪吕卓峰吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞反问：“你觉得呢？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲这才意识到，眼前的前顶流可是敢跟祥华娱乐以及众品牌方、广大网友对着干的绝世狠人啊！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他会在乎吕卓峰？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">不会的！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">虱子多了根本不怕痒！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">当温莲从房间走出来的时候，还有些恍惚。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">门外排队的人看到温莲手里拿着一份文件袋，皆定格住了：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“她通过试镜成功了？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“也不知道她试镜的是哪个角色。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲仿若未听见，迈着修长美腿，扬长而去。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">接下来，一个又一个演员接受了试镜。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞并没有签下每个演员，事实证明，成丞的决定是没有错的，温莲的颜值确实是独一档的，没有一个女演员颜值比拟温莲的，就连接近的都没有，<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">很多来试镜梁安娜的，或者其他重要角色的，成丞都让他们改成了其他角色。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">比如有几句台词的美女荷官、出镜比较多的小配角等等。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这让贝雷帽松了一口气，看来成丞对自己的电影还是负责的。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">直到颜苟儿走进房间，成丞和贝雷帽眼前都一亮。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">眼前的女孩儿条件太优越了，无论是长相、气质、仪态都无可挑剔，她的出现，就像是山间清泉流淌过鹅卵石河道一般，扑面而来一股清新的气息，令人心旷神怡。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">如果说温莲是在人芳心上的纵火犯，代表着世间“女人”一词的极致，那颜苟儿就是雪山上侍奉神庙的圣女，不染纤尘。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿很有礼貌的道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“两位导演好，我是帝京电影学院表演系大三的学生，我叫颜苟儿，想要试镜的角色是女二，宋雨。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">说着，她将自己打印出来的纸质档简历递到成丞和贝雷帽面前。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">贝雷帽和成丞对视一眼。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">挖到宝了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞翻动着她的简历，看了一会儿，疑惑道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“你之前没有表演经历吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿摇了摇头，道：“没有，一直没有机会。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞：“那你为什么选择来我们剧组参加面试呢？你也知道我们的情况，不怕对你将来造成影响吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿道：“相比那些，我更在于剧本的质量。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞露出笑容：“那你选对了，我们这是一部出色的社会问题剧，我们的电影在取材于上万件真实的案例基础上，精彩、丰富、真实地表现了网络诈骗的黑暗与残酷和反诈骗斗争的艰难，是一部极具现实意义的影片，多段情节环环相扣，人物刻画细致，无论骗子、受害人还是家属，人物的矛盾、恐惧.”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿轻轻皱眉，打断了他的自吹自擂，道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“我可以看一下剧本吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“可以，当然可以。”，成丞大手一挥，“岛导，给她一份完整版的剧本。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“完整版的？”，贝雷帽确认了一下。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞道：“当然，完整版的。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">递给颜苟儿的时候，贝雷帽提醒了一句：“你好，麻烦看完之后不要泄露剧情。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿点头。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">半个小时很快过去，当颜苟儿抬起头来的时候，看着成丞和贝雷帽问询的表情，脸红了红，有些不好意思，道：“抱歉，我看的时间有点久了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿道：“这是一个非常合格的商业片，我觉得很好，不过，宋雨这个角色好像有点单薄.不好意思，导演，我没有批评的意思.”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿点头，道：“嗯嗯，我理解这一点，那我可以面试了吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞：“面试什么？你已经通过了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿也露出和温莲一样的表情，有些许困惑。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞道：“我相信你的专业水准，从你进来的时候我就在观察你，你的演员形体课一定是满分。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿被夸的有些不好意思。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“而且我们有半个月的进组培训，总之，不用担心演技的问题，对了，你学校什么时候放假？几号能进组？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“欢迎加入。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿一触即分，道：“谢谢。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿离开后，贝雷帽好奇的问：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“成导，你好像特别看重她？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞道：“当然，这可是一块璞玉，颜值高，仪态好，还没有跟经纪公司签约，稍微打造打造就能爆火，也不知道之前为什么没有公司盯上她，不过这样更好！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">说实话，看到颜苟儿的一瞬间，成丞脑海里就闪过了很多电影电视剧：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">《少年的你》、《那些年》、《我的少女时代》、《神雕侠侣》、《仙剑奇侠传》.<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">不过，他对这个女孩了解较少，还需要再观察观察，看看人品性格，是否值得他培养。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞笑眯眯道：“岛导，喊下一个吧。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">下一个进来的是个男演员。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“导演好，我叫李阳，现在是一名话剧演员.”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“成丞，听说你已经完成选角了，方便透露一下吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“当然可以了！”，成丞笑着对眼前的记者道，“经过两天时间，对全国演员的遴选，我终于选出了较为优秀演员，我相信每位演员的加入都将为这部电影增添亮点和深度（大拇指）”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">记者杀人诛心：“你在选角前向楚青、谌龙、祝海生、齐丽等人发出选角邀请，请问你当时是怎么想的，他们来参加选角了吗？能看到他们出演吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞颇为遗憾的摇头：“在选角过程中，我确实向楚青影帝、谌龙大哥等人发送了邀约，但我更注重演员的表现和融入度，经过我和岛导，哦，也就是副导演的审慎考虑，我们决定将机会给更需要的演员（再次大拇指）。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">其实老师也一直在想办法，下个月韩峰拍新戏，回学校选角，我还想推荐你去呢，可是你呢？闹出这一出，把老师的心血都辜负了！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿一开始还据理力争，试图说服老师，但她越是讲理，在老师眼里越是执迷不悟，最后老师痛心疾首的把她赶出了办公室。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“是在意外界的声音吧？”，温莲问。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲看着颜苟儿就像是看到了曾经的自己，说道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“咱们整个剧组，都是死猪不怕开水烫的人，导演，李阳，我，齐昊，都是这样，只有你是刚踏上这条路的人，在意外界的声音也正常，但是记得，别让它们影响到你，你想听他们说‘我就知道她选错了’，还是‘她竟然选对了？’。我经历过前一种，但我现在想经历后一种。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿表情舒展开来：“谢谢莲姐，我现在好多了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲笑道：“别谢我，你看看咱们导演，什么时候在意过这些东西？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">说着，她拍了拍成丞的座椅靠背，呼唤道：“导演，导演。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞回过头来，问：“怎么了？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲问：“为什么你非要我们买中午的票啊。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞分过一只眼睛来看向她，严肃道：“因为早晚会出事。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲向颜苟儿挑了挑眉，那意思是，你看吧，咱导演精神状态多稳定！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿肩膀耸动，差点笑出声来。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞疑惑问：“怎么了？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲道：“没事了，导演你忙去吧。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞从善如流的回过头：“哦，好。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">抵达馥海市后，跟剧组见面，成丞和贝雷帽对李阳、颜苟儿、温莲等演员展开了为期十五天的培训。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">然后，他们就被成丞给惊艳到了，不只是演员，就连剧组的人，贝雷帽、那里全露、小肚，也全被成丞惊艳到了！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他们发现成丞竟然真的懂电影，懂演技！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">每个角色，成丞都能由浅入深的剖析其人物底色，给出切实可行的演绎方法，帮助演员代入。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">而且，他的演技指导甚至能精确到微表情级别，每个角色出场时是什么样状态，什么样子，面对冲突时，情绪是如何递进的，他都能给到！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这还是原来那个成丞？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这简直颠覆了所有人的三观！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这当然得益于系统的帮助，只能说不愧是大礼包，融入记忆后，成丞相当于拍过一遍了，这是第二遍。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">不过，这段时间下来，成丞片场暴君的气质再也遮掩不住了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">脑海里融入了大礼包的代价就是有些独断专行，大权独揽，容不下演员的自我见解，当然了，如果是有益的自我见解他当然采纳，但是大多数的自我见解在他看来都是多余且无益的。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞最常说的一句话就是“我不要你觉得，我要我觉得”。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">另外一点，就是包括演员在内，还有剧组的工作人员，都越发担心成丞的精神状态。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他真的有病啊！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">比如有一天成丞突然吃起了药，别人问他为什么吃，他说感冒了，嗯，这一点很正常。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但是接下来就不对了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">第一天吃药的时候，成丞饭前吃。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">第二天，成丞饭后吃。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">第三天就更过分了，他拌饭吃。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">李阳问他为什么。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞答：我不能让这个病发现我吃药的规律，我要打他个措手不及。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">众人：好生缜密的逻辑！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">除此之外，成丞的精神病行为还有很多。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">比如他会经常洗手，然后看着眼前的空处兴奋，好像在参与一件很重大的事情；<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">看见某个演员不愿意吃盒饭，他会掏出自己的钱包，正当演员以为成丞会给钱的时候，成丞从钱包里掏出来一双筷子，告诉他，用这个去吃喜欢吃的东西吧！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">你从哪里掏出来的筷子啊魂淡！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">还有网上，一个网友分享自己家的猫猫去世了，一楼评价了个“节哀”，成丞也跟着评价了“节哀”，后面一长串人都跟着他发了“节哀”，直到有一个人意识到了不对：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">等等，成丞你为什么都对一楼说节哀啊！还有后面的网友，你们跟队形的时候没发现吗？不是他家猫去世啊！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">总之，这样的事情简直不胜枚举。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">又一天，阳光明媚，成丞出现在片场。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">李阳：“导演，早上好啊！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞发愣：“你是谁？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">李阳：“”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">什么我是谁，我是李阳啊！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">李阳迷惑：“成导，你不认识我了吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞道：“我不是成丞，我是成丞的分身，成丞说他太困，不想起了，所以今天我来顶他一下，你可以叫我丞导，成丞的丞。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">齐昊走了过来：“导演，你们在说什么呢？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">李阳脑袋很乱：“别吵，我在思考。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">齐昊：“怎么了？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">李阳：“成导说他现在不是成导，是成导的分身，所以他不认识我了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">齐昊：“导演，那你认识我吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞摇了摇头：“不认识。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这边的情况，很快引起了注意，其他人也聚集了过来，李阳解释清楚情况后，所有人都懵了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲：“导演，我是温莲啊，你电影的女主角，你不记得我了吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞摇头：“不记得。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">贝雷帽：“我呢？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞摇头：“也不认识。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">那里全露：“我呢我呢？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞继续摇头。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这时，颜苟儿冒了出来，她递给成丞一个鸡蛋：“导演导演，我我我！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞伸手接过鸡蛋，眼睛一亮：“我知道你，成丞跟我说过，你是颜苟儿！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿咧嘴一笑。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲仰慕的看着颜苟儿：你是怎么找到跟精神病人的相处方式的？！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">李阳道：“那导演的‘分身’既然不记得我们了，那我们每个人都自我介绍一下吧？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他看向四周，征询着众人的意见。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">众人皆表示赞同。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞也道：“好啊好啊。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“我是温莲。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“我是齐昊。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">中午，场边。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲扒着饭，吐槽道：“跟精神病人相处真累啊。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿笑道：“还好啦，嘿嘿，导演虽然经常犯病，但不会影响别人，而且还挺有意思的。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲也莞尔一笑：“倒也是，确实很沙雕很搞笑，如果不是精神病，导演真的蛮好的，对我们也照顾，讲解也细心，为人也好，长得也帅。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿侧目：“莲姐，你动心了？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲道：“怎么可能，先不说人家看不看得上我，就说跟他在一起，你就不怕晚上睡觉的时候，他把你的头当西瓜砍了？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿吓得缩了一下，但旋即就反驳道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“怎么可能，导演没那么可怕啦~”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">第28章 电影开机<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“现在我宣布，《孤注一掷》开机仪式，正式开始！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">半个月后，筹备了一个月的剧组，终于开机了！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">虽然没有媒体朋友，但在贝雷帽等人的建议下，剧组还是搞了个颇为隆重的开机仪式。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">贝雷帽cue完流程后，他请了成丞上台讲话。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞走上台，拿起话筒，说道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“虽然今天是开机仪式，但实际上，我跟在座的各位，已经一起工作半个月了，跟剧组的人还要更久，不知道大家是怎么想，但是我对大家，对这部电影，充满了信——”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">正说着，他手机铃声突然响了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞捂着话筒，道：“不好意思啊，我接个电话。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">说着，他便一手叉腰，一手将耳机放在耳边，站在台上打起电话来。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“喂，张经理，我房子卖出去了？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“十二万一平吗？有点太低了吧，我那可是四环内的大平层，这样的房源打着灯笼也不好找，我知道，我是卖的有点急，所以我才标了十四万嘛，不然放在平时，十五万都有人抢着要！这样吧，张经理，你带着客户看看，我那些家具他有没有看上的.”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“哎，好，张经理你帮帮忙，回头回帝京，我请你吃饭。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">挂断电话，坦然承受着台下众人异样的目光，成丞无缝衔接刚才的话题：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“心，我相信，在接下来的半个月里，大家一定可以非常好的配合，然后拿出2021年的一部大爆款！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">说完，成丞走下台。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">其他几个主创也陆续上台讲话后，成丞和贝雷帽领着所有人一起上了香，揭了红布，又合了张影，下午，便开始了正式的拍摄。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">第一场戏，是李阳饰演的男主角潘生在大会场里的戏。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">潘生是一个资深程序员，在一个大厂上班，做出了很多成绩，在公司任职会上，他原本以为升职的会是他，结果没想到却是一个关系户。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">潘生一怒之下将工牌甩下，愤然离场，并利用程序，在会场屏幕上投放了很多恶搞的表情，最后，潇洒离开酒店。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这是一个大场面的戏，因为是公司开会，人员很多，有很多远、中、近景的频繁切换，非常考验导演的调度能力。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">上场前，李阳给自己打气：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">导演为了拍电影，把自己的房子都卖了，我一定要拿出最好的表现，对得起导演，也对得起自己！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">曾经失去的，我要全部拿回来！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">结果，出乎他意料的来了，他刚上场一会儿，还没反应过来呢，成丞三下五除二就拍完了，并且已经开始吆喝着要撤退了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">前后总共没有半小时啊！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">要知道，这段剧情放在电影里也要有个两三分钟啊！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这就完事了？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">李阳心里打鼓道：“导演，我要不要再来一条啊？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞奇怪道：“拍得挺好的，为什么要再来一条啊？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“啊？”，这问题问的有道理，李阳挠着头，也有些怀疑自己了，说道，“我就觉得有点太快了，心里有点不踏实。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞严肃道：“这段戏，我们已经排练过很多遍了，伱演的很好，你要自信，知道吗？我这辈子打算拍至少一百部电影，时间不等人啊李阳。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">李阳道：“可是我还觉得有点太快了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞：“你这样想，拍的越快，剩下的时间就越多，剩下的时间越多，浪费的时间就越多，浪费的时间越多，拍的越慢，所以拍的越快拍的越慢。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">留李阳上一边思考去了，成丞继续招呼着剧组人员将摄影器材搬上车，前往下一个拍摄场地。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">其实李阳不知道的是，成丞根本不需要拍那么多的废镜头，他脑海里就有完整的成片，只要对着成片拍就完事了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">一般我们看的电影，镜头时长大概在两个小时左右，而在片场拍的素材跟电影时长的比例一般是50:1，也就是说素材时长是100个小时。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但是成丞素材时长要缩水个十倍，最多5:1，这就大大节省了时间。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">而且还不止于此，除了素材的拍摄外，成丞知道自己想拍的是什么，不需要频繁试错，也就是说，他不止在拍摄素材这一点上节省了时间，还在拍摄素材这一点上节省了时间，这是双倍的节省时间。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">一天下午加晚上，成丞拍完了两场戏，分别是潘生在会场的戏、潘生在飞机上的戏，以及外景转场的镜头。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">如此高效的拍戏速度，使成丞快枪手的名号一战成名。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">接下来两天，剧组人员更是知道了什么叫布置现场的速度跟不上拍戏的速度，很多时候需要双线并行，也就是说成丞在拍戏的时候，剧组的一部分工作人员已经在布置下一场戏的现场了，当成丞拍第二场戏的时候，剧组的人员马上要去布置第三场。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">就这还赶不上成丞拍戏的速度，这也就是人手不够，器材不够，否则，至少要三条线并行。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">很快，就迎来了成丞的第一场戏。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">潘生被骗到缅北后，像是猪猡一样被带到了园区，成丞饰演的陆秉坤就是在这个时候出场的。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“快来快来，围观导演演戏啊！”，温莲兴奋的对颜苟儿说道。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿正在努力的提上小白鞋，道：“等我一下等我一下。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">很快，两人就到了片场，发现片场已经围满了人了，都是来围观成丞演戏的。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这段时间以来，成丞顶流纨绔的形象已经在他们心中淡去，取而代之的是一个精通演技、经验丰富、才华横溢、思路清奇的年轻导演。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但是他给众演员们讲了半个月的戏，演员们却还没见成丞演过一场，于是心中不由自主的产生了好奇：咱们这位导演演技到底怎么样？是纸上谈兵，还是有真材实料？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿垫着脚往里面瞅，温莲目露期待。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">周围不断有窃窃私语声响起：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“这还是咱们导演第一场戏呢！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“终于等到了！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“你猜导演能不能一条过？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“废话，肯定能。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“你这么相信导演啊？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“我倒觉得悬，有时候跟人讲戏讲得明明白白，到自己的时候可能就不会演了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“没错，有这个可能。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“嘘——别说话了，开始了！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">第29章 炸裂的演技<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">众人围观下，已经搭好的外景中——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">李阳饰演的潘生等被骗来的人，双手被绑在身后，形状凄惨。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">负责押送他们的人，手持棒球棒，站在他们左右，盯着他们一举一动。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">门口的台阶上，无数老员工观赏着这一幕。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">齐昊饰演的反派二号、手持机枪的打手，也已经站到指定的位置。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">贝雷帽坐在监视器前询问：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“各部门，都准备好了吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“灯光组准备完毕！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“道具组准备完毕！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“摄影组准备完毕，没有问题。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“.”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">贝雷帽点了点头，说道：“全场注意，开始！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“第109场，第一镜，第一条！action!”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">场记敲响打板，然后迅速退出了镜头。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">监视器下，成丞穿着一身东南亚风格的衣服，手上拿着一根雪糕，腕上戴着一串佛珠，上来就给了齐昊所饰演的反派二号一脚。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“又打~”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“都靠脑袋吃饭的嘛，打坏了你来？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">边说着，他踩着精准的动线，走到齐昊身前，面对着一众刚被掳来的“猪猡”，无视身前快贴到他脸上的摄像机，道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“对不起啊各位，先替他道个歉，我姓陆，是这边的经理，之后呢，各位为我工作，谢谢配合，昂！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">经过半个月的积累，成丞的演技已经达到了85分，出演这样的角色手拿把掐。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">而且他还又抽到了一个身高丸，目前的身高已经达到了186，站在一群178左右的演员人中间，显得鹤立鸡群，即便他微微耷拉着肩膀，也显得十分有气场，让人不能忽视。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">此时，他一出场，就镇住了所有人。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">贝雷帽瞳孔一缩：“成岛他——”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">孟才咽了口唾沫……<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">一个不知名的群演叫道：“我配合你妈了个狗东西，老子要回家。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">手持棒球棍的打手立马冲上前，把“猪猡”们摁在地上打。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">一片纷乱中，成丞从齐昊手里接过手枪，一手捂住耳朵，一手朝天打了一枪。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">而后他看也不看，将枪递给了后面的齐昊，接着，指着地上被打打的“猪猡”，道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“扶起来嘛，都是同事啊~”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“你们想要的东西啊，在外面都得不到，但是在我这里可以，还很快~”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">很快，一场戏演完，成丞走向了监控器，坐在贝雷帽旁边，看着刚才的画面。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">众人全都盯着他，神色莫名，仿佛第一次认识他一样。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">就连贝雷帽也有些呆滞。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞道：“没问题了，过了，下一条。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">自己出演，自己当裁判，但是没有人质疑成丞的表现。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">所有人看向成丞的目光都充满了惊奇和震怖，不敢相信刚才是成丞演出来的！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">刚才，成丞的表现看似很放松，但内行人都看得出来，这场戏可不简单！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">因为这是本片明面上大boss的第一次亮相，所以必须要给观影者留下深刻的印象，否则这个人物就立不起来。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">而成丞做到了！不止做到了，还很惊艳！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他将一个很平淡的戏演的如无声的惊雷，几句台词，就将一个隐藏在人物底层逻辑里的狠辣演绎了出来，尤其是他的眼神，表面上很平静，却内蕴乾坤，看着被骗来的人，像是看猪仔，看尸体，看货物，但从来不是人！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这种感觉非常的玄妙，简单来说，专业的人能看出他演技的几个层次，最上面的层次是什么，中间的层次是什么，底层的层次是什么，层层分明！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">而不懂行的人看不出那么多层次，却本能的觉得这个人很有威胁，很可怕。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">温莲张着红唇，目瞪口呆，对旁边的颜苟儿小声道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“成导演技这么好的嘛，我都有种感觉，他有点不像是演的，我靠！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">她忍不住爆粗口了：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“他原来演技没这么好的啊！我这几天恶补了他之前的剧，明明是很烂的啊？怎么变化这么大？这不科学！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿也有些失神，艰难地张口：“莲姐，伱有没有觉得，成导的演技好像是我们所有人里最好的？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">听到颜苟儿的话，温莲沉默了，虽然她不想承认，但好像——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">确实是！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">相比她俩，近距离跟成丞搭戏的齐昊更是震撼，就在刚才，他都感觉自己快接不上成丞的戏了，哪怕成丞跟他没几句台词，没几个眼神交流，单单那种气势，就被成丞给压倒了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">要知道他虽然是演网大出来的，但自忖演技已经很强了，演过十几部网大，部部都是男一男二，从没有被人喷过演技烂！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">可他照样被压制了！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他仿佛真的代入了角色中，虽然他是一个反派二号，动手的戏比较多，动辄打骂，声嘶力竭，但是比起那个笑起来很和善，很平常的“陆秉坤”，他永远个上不得台面的“小角色”。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">齐昊有点被打击到了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他看着成丞的背影，表情有些苦涩：这份演技在这个年龄段也数得着了吧？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">李阳也有些恍惚，刚刚的成丞，让他想到了曾经有幸搭过戏的影帝楚青。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">一样的不显山不漏水，但是仅露出的冰山一角，就让人感到震骇……<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“愣什么？”，成丞打破宁静，道，“下一场戏了！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">能把在场的一众人都镇住，成丞自然是暗爽不已，但是面上他不会表现出来。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他就是要用最淡然的姿态，装完最炸裂的逼！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">为了今天的演出，他可不只是用到了85分的演技，还用了两滴神奇眼药水，加深了他对“诈骗头子”的眼神理解。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">随着对系统认知的不断提升，成丞也越来越理解了演技分是什么东西。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">演技分为情感表达能力、表演技巧、角色塑造能力、融入角色的能力等好几个部分，单单拎出表演技巧来，又分为肢体语言、语言表达、面部表情、声音运用、情绪表达等几个部分。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">通俗来讲，85分的演技是综合分值，但并不代表每一个细分项都达到了85分。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">而且，因为不同类型的角色饰演难度不同，他呈现的效果也会有高有低。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这主要取决于角色本身的特点和情感表达的复杂程度。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">比如情感丰富的角色、反差大的角色、历史人物或特定背景的角色、身体语言重要的角色等等，饰演难度就比一般角色大得多！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">也就是说，85分不是万能的，不是饰演每种类型的角色都能饰演到85分，这也不符合常理。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">就比如让成丞来饰演皇帝，他可能就只能饰演到80分，甚至更低。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但是如果本色出演，演一个明星，他可能超常发挥，演到85分之上。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">而“神奇眼药水”这一系列神奇物品的作用在于，能够指定提升对某类角色的饰演能力，就算将来把演技分刷到100分，通过神奇物品，也有很大的提升空间。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞估计，用了两滴神奇眼药水后，他将陆秉坤至少已经演到了88分，甚至以上。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">ps：感谢梁人文大佬打赏的100点起点币！大佬牛逼！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“怎么说呢，你的演技在初出茅庐的新人里，已经算很强的了，如果是平时，我就给你过了，但是这段质问的戏，演不好，很不讨喜，会让观众讨厌。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿感觉心里一暖，原来导演是原来是为了我好吗？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞指了指旁边的凳子：“坐，我给你讲讲戏。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿轻轻点头，坐在了成丞的身边。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞详细剖析着自己对这个角色的理解。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">其实原作中，宋雨这个角色这段戏就有些不讨喜，周也确实演的也不够好。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">孤注一掷上映后，有条热评：只有周也像是在演另一部戏。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞不想颜苟儿的出道作就遭到如此质疑。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他希望颜苟儿可以通过表演去弥补。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">十分钟后，成丞拍了拍颜苟儿的肩膀，悄无声息的给她用了“一次性神奇演技贴”，为了保险起见，还一次性给她用了两张，这才说道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“好了，再去试一试吧。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿感觉心有所悟，站了起来，道：“谢谢导演。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这段戏是颜苟儿饰演的宋雨的男朋友被陆秉坤为首的势力套牢了，骗走了800万，一时间接受不了，跳楼自杀了，没死成，却也成为了植物人。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">宋雨十分痛苦，恰逢影片中的女警来学校做反诈宣传，当时宋雨向女警求助过，想让女警帮她劝一劝男朋友，但女警因为事务繁忙，每天都在跟被骗的群众打交道，实在顾不上宋雨男朋友，且女警认为被骗者更应该自救，就算她去劝了也没起多大作用，就把这件事放在一边了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这就跟成丞说的一样，这段演出来并不难，难的是怎么让观众不讨厌。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿回过头来，精致的脸庞此刻显得有些苍白，蝶羽一般的睫毛轻颤着。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">失去恋人、天地崩塌的痛苦要大过恨意。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">第31章 即将开庭，骂战开启<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">剧组还在馥海市拍戏，他大部分的戏份都集中在前两天拍完了，只剩下了几场收尾的戏。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这次回帝京，是因为他跟张娇的案子要开庭了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他起诉网友和大V的案子很多已经开完庭了，这种侵犯名誉权的案子，基本上一告一个准，只看被侵犯方追不追究而已。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">因为是找人代理的，成丞也就没回来，但这次却不得不回来了，因为这是至关重要的一次开庭，决定了他未来的发展路线。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">如果胜诉了，他自然能重回公共视野，尽管没有人敢用他，但至少在他有没有出轨、有没有犯错、有没有违反公序良俗这几点上是能够得到定性的，是能够翻盘洗白的。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但倘若他败诉了，恐怕就要面临汹涌的舆论反扑了，这两个月的努力成功都要付之东流。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他大可以只当个幕后或者是远走好莱坞发展，毕竟他现在手里有那么多的文艺作品，尤其是《三体》和《小王子》，这可是全球通杀，光靠这两本书，他就能赚的盆满钵满，而且系统也未必抽不出来外国的文娱作品。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但那都是不得已而为之了，能在国内发展，肯定优先在国内发展。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">果然，秦威皱紧眉头，艰难的说道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“但是，这是一起社会重大舆论事件，公众的关注度很高，法官可能会受到外部因素的影响，判决结果并不完全取决于我们的证据和法律依据。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">为什么成丞都已经胜诉了，还有人在这里颠倒黑白，胡搅蛮缠呢？他们恨不能通过网线传到对面去，把对面的狗头打爆，让她看看花儿为什么这么红！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">就在这时，张娇还没发消息呢，小黑子却先一步收到了成丞微博更新的通知。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">点进去后，成丞没有发疯，只是简单的发表了一首诗：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“千锤万凿出深山，烈火焚烧若等闲。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">粉骨碎身浑不怕，要留清白在人间。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
