<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">第47章 反诈宣传老成（求追读）<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">在距离国庆档仅剩11天的情况下，《孤注一掷》在三大电影的夹缝中开始了宣发。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">姜望还是很给力的，在放弃了30%的抽成的情况下，依然为《孤注一掷》调配了过亿级别的宣发资源。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这种级别的资源通常只有C至B级别的电影才能享有，相当于电影总票房估值在5至10亿之间的级别。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">当然，他也有为自己出口气的打算，但单从事实上说，姜望的决策与实力，无疑为这部电影注入了强大的动力。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">被封锁的消息面，在万斯影业大撒币的攻势下，终于撕开了一道裂缝。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">《孤注一掷》的宣传视频，开始在网络上疯传。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">其中成丞在《精卫》的歌声中拜神的场面、温莲性感荷官抛飞吻的场面、李阳反复挨打的场面，引起了无数博主和素人的竞相模仿。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">《孤注一掷》的宣发角度也很刁钻，就是怎么吸引眼球怎么来。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">首先，电影的宣传口号是‘取材于上万件真实案例，多一人观影，少一人上当受骗’。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">其次，就是把各位主创的陈芝麻烂谷子事再拉出来晒了一遍。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">比如温莲，是如何从国民女儿一步步失去人心、无人问津的。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">比如李阳，如何从大热剧男主，一步步人设崩塌，无戏可演的。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">还有成丞，是如何天胡开局，一朝崩塌。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">万斯影业当然知道，这种宣发手段很是低俗、下作，但他们也实在没招了，如果不采取这种另辟蹊径的手段，很难追赶上另外三部大制作的电影。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">而且，宣发本来就是互相比谁更下作，谁更会QJ观众眼球，真要遵循什么‘君子协定’，那还不如直接认输。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">不过，万斯影业的做法，即便在比烂的宣发中还是略显低级了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">好消息是这种宣发手段确实有效，《孤注一掷》成功脱颖而出，让人知道了国庆档除了另外三部大制作电影外，还有这么一部电影。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">坏消息是，《孤注一掷》成为小丑了，负面声音相当的多。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“我看应该是‘少一人观影，少一人被骗’才对吧。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“这电影真是恶心人，完全是靠炒作和负面新闻来吸引人，我跟吃了屎一样难受。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“救救我的眼睛吧，作为一个从未拍过电影的新人，成丞知道如何讲好一个故事吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“一个完全没有拍摄经验的新人导演，一个明显是为了圈钱而拍的电影，这部电影简直把圈钱做到了新高度！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“看这主创团队真的是笑了，都是一些在娱乐圈边缘徘徊的糊咖，他们有什么资格来拍电影？真当观众都不挑了是吧，明着往我们嘴里喂屎？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“笑死，这部电影的主创团队人品都有问题，简直就是一部活生生的劣迹艺人编年史。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“人品问题比电影本身还要精彩，观众可能只记得他们的丑闻，而不是电影的内容。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“万斯影业是不是觉得用这样的糊咖团队来吸引眼球是个好主意？之前万斯搞得电影虽然扑街了，但起码还请了大导演，请了马窕周雨他们来当主演，有诚意在，现在装都不装了吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“不看不看，谁去电影院看这垃圾货谁煞笔。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这些声音，有部分成丞的黑粉、有温莲的黑粉、有李阳的黑粉，也有对家指使的网络水军。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">电影还未上映，温莲、颜苟儿、李阳等人就已心若死灰，照这样下去，这部电影还有希望吗？难道他们的机会再一次被葬送了？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">不！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成导总有办法！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">距离电影上映前一周，成丞跟馥海市宣传科正式建立了合作。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">馥海市宣传科对电影非常满意，他们不但按照承诺成为了《孤注一掷》的荣誉出片方，还启动了系统内部的宣传资源，在各平台为《孤注一掷》站台。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">同时，成丞也从馥海市的宣传科要到了一个任务：反诈宣传。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">要到任务的当天，成丞就开启了抖音直播，每天在线十五小时，高强度宣传反诈知识。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">每连上一个主播，他就问人家下载了反诈中心app没有。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">如果没有，等PK赢了对面，成丞就要求对面主播，以及对面直播间老铁下载反诈中心app，同时给人家布置任务，让对面主播下一次连线时，也要给下一个主播普及反诈知识。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">一般反诈宣传的直播间肯定没有多少人看，因为太枯燥了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但是成丞有活啊！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他太有直播效果了！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他不但会说英语、日语、法语，还会说苍山话，甚至还会心算，他会让直播间的观众随便出一个四五位数以内的加减乘除法，他都能在看到题目的第一时间算出来。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">除此之外，他还能过目不忘，他会掏出一本书，随便让观众说出一个页码，然后他翻到当页，最多记个三十秒，就开始背诵。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">背诵的时候，他会把书翻过来对准摄像头，让观众检查，当他背完，观众会发现他背的一个字不差。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他还会编程，并当场做了一个自动生成微博内容的网站，使用者可以设置发布者是谁，发布的内容是什么，点击生成后，就会生成对应的微博，再一截图，就能起到以假乱真的效果，直播间的观众玩得不亦乐乎。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">一开始，涌进直播间的还都是来看热闹的，甚至还有一些人进了直播间就喷，各种恶语相向，但是看着看着，他们就被成丞的直播内容给吸引了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">除了上述那些，成丞还会在直播间唱歌跳舞，哪怕有人故意想让他出丑，点了他的‘成名曲’和“成名舞”，他也毫不推脱，当场表演给大家看。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">给观众留下最深刻印象的是成丞的魔术。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">当时，直播间里有一个观众说‘你再卖力我也不会去看你的电影’，成丞也没恼怒，就说我可以表演一个全世界魔术师都无法模仿出来的魔术。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">如果你看不出我的破绽来，伱就去看我的电影。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">还没等这个观众有所反应，其他观众就纷纷炸开了，表示如果你真表演了一个所有人都看不出破绽的魔术，那我们去电影院看你的电影又如何呢？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">左右不过几十块钱的事情。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">于是成丞二话不说当场烧开了一壶水，仗着有铁齿铜牙的技能，直接往嘴里倒。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">虽然十几秒后又吐出去了，但依旧骇人听闻。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">直播间所有人都惊呆了！都傻眼了！都不可置信！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">乖乖！这可是刚烧开的，还冒着热气的100度热水啊！这温度真的是人的嘴巴可以承受的吗？！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">等成丞表演结束，直播间所有人都挠破了头，也想不出他是怎么做的。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">是壶有问题？还是热水有问题？难道在烧的过程中突然换成了别的液体或者是干冰？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">直播间众说纷纭，各种猜测五花八门，但就是没人猜这是真的热水。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">因为这实在超出了常人的理解能力！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞也不解释，再次表演了一遍，这次，他先是把热水倒进嘴里，紧接着又在嘴里打了一个鸡蛋。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">最后，当他把嘴里的鸡蛋连同水吐出来的时候，观众发现，鸡蛋已经变成鸡蛋花了！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">夭寿了！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">在嘴里沏开鸡蛋，这谁见过啊！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这魔术也太牛逼了吧？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">表演完这个魔术后，成丞又凭借着之前抽到的初级魔术技能表演了一些其他魔术，力求达到以真乱假，以假乱真的效果。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">至此直播间的观众都被他征服了，无数人被吸引到了成丞的直播间，人数最多的时候，一度超过了三千万人同时在线，直接破了抖音直播间最高在线人数的记录。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“真的是这样的。”，一个人回答道，“马总，成丞太会做直播了，又是唱歌，又是演小品，又是直播抽书，我们的人根本带不起节奏来。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">马荣眯着眼睛，施加压力：“那就没有别的办法了吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">那个人道：“马总，您打开微博看看就知道，成丞非常擅长把握观众的心理，能够迅速应对各种突发情况，而且他的直播内容既有娱乐性，又有话题度，短时间内，真的没有办法，我们也不能强行扭转舆论。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">马荣盛怒：“这点小事办不好，废物！都是废物！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">那个人小心翼翼抬头看了马荣良一眼，撇了撇嘴：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">你不也是拿他没办法吗？还有脸说我？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">帝京，某活动后台。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“我们的手段没有起作用？”，吕卓峰语气中的不满和愤怒几乎要溢出来。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“是的，吕导。”，身边的人小心翼翼地回答，尽量不去触碰吕卓峰的怒气。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“好好好！”，吕卓峰连说了三个好字，每一个字都像从牙缝里挤出来似的，“既然没起作用那就算了！电影的事情终究还是要电影场上见，成丞现在跳的欢，也不过是上不得台面的小道！我就不信他的电影还真能起来！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">赵文良附和道：“是要给这个小子一个难忘的教训了，让他知道电影场跟舆论场不是一回事，电影是要靠真金白银说话的！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">吕卓峰深吸了一口气，平复了一下自己的情绪，然后拍了拍赵文良的肩膀道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“文良，再发一遍通稿，我要让所有人都知道，谁才是这个市场的真正主宰！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“好！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">第50章 帝影人之耻<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">时间一天天往前推移，终于来到了9月30号，电影上映的前一天。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“看到没有？那个人就是个颜苟儿，演了《孤注一掷》的那个！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“呵，就是她啊，真尼玛丢人，也不知道她怎么想的，演了成丞的电影，这辈子估计都要毁了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“主要是不止丢她自己的人啊，连带着我们学校也跟着一块丢人现眼，还不知道隔壁京戏这次怎么嘲讽我们呢，肯定又说我们帝影的人为了红不择手段了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“这种人，跟她一个学校我都感到恶心！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“问题是能红也行啊！但演成丞的电影能红吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“等着看吧，明天她的电影上映后，肯定会成为全校的笑柄！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“长得也挺好看的，真的可惜了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“依我看，她就是摆明了不知道自己几斤几两，你们听过没，之前有一个剧组来我们学校挑演员，看上她了，但好像她嫌剧本太烂，牺牲太多，就没答应，结果你猜怎么着，她大学整整三年都没戏演！我本来还以为她清高，没想到是待价而沽呢！总想着会有更大的导演，更大的剧组来找她，结果等着等着，等到自己不值钱了哈哈哈哈，最后迫于无奈演了这么一个电影。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“她当初还不如从了那导演呢。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“谁说不是呢，人呐，就是失去了才知道自己错过了什么。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“她当初从了那导演说不定已经成了大明星了，也好过演这种电影，呵呵呵，这大概就是自视甚高的下场吧。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“活该！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">正午的阳光略微有些刺眼，如常洒在电影学院的校园里。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿穿着一袭白裙，轻盈地走在去往食堂的林荫小道上。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">黑色的小皮鞋鞋跟在石板路上轻轻敲击，奏起了优美的乐章，把那些嘈杂的、惹人生烦的议论声都压了过去。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成导在直播间里顶着成千上万人的骂声，为《孤注一掷》做宣传，这又算得了什么呢？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“阿姨，我要二两米饭，谢谢。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">来到食堂窗口，颜苟儿将盘子放在打饭窗口前，冲打饭阿姨脆声说道。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">她说话的声音，就像两块玉佩轻轻相击，悦耳动听。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“好嘞！”，打饭阿姨按她要求，将米饭给她打好，并嘱托道，“要多吃一点啊，看你瘦的，阿姨都心疼。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">在电影学院里，打饭阿姨就喜欢这种小白花一样的小姑娘，不像那些花枝招展的妖艳贱货，看着就不像正经孩子。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“谢谢阿姨~”，颜苟儿露出笑容，简单道谢。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">接着，她又去别的窗口打了一份汤，一份素菜，想了想，念起打饭阿姨的关心，又多打了一个荤菜，然后找了个无人的位置坐了下来。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">周围的人再次频频看向她，讥讽的声音不加掩饰，似乎就是为了故意让她听见。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“真丢人！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“她还有脸在食堂吃饭。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“要是我演了这种电影，我都不好意思说自己是电影学院的。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿小口的吃着饭，不疾不徐。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">吃完饭后，她将桌子收拾干净，端着盘子离开。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">有人在她身后啐道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“呸！不知道她脏了臭了后，还会不会这么装！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">回到宿舍，还没走到门口，里面就传来凌琦和邢菲的声音。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“真不知道颜苟儿怎么想的，今天还有朋友问我，咱们学校演成丞电影的那个是不是我们宿舍的，我也是服了，她怎么会选这种烂片？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“哈哈哈哈，谁知道她呢！咱们宿舍一个汪红，一个颜苟儿，伱别说还真有意思。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“确实有意思，一个鸡，一个瞎眼狗哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“你说颜苟儿心里会不会觉得我们目光短浅，只有她才是慧眼识珠，幻想着这部电影上映后会火吧？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“还真有可能，平时就她会装了，整天抱着一本书看，感觉跟我们不一样似的，装什么啊，我看了她就觉得恶心。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“嘿嘿，这下好了，可以好好欣赏她的表情了，演烂片被全网骂会是什么感觉呢？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿在门口停了一瞬，身体有些僵硬，但还是推门走了进去，目不斜视，回到自己的位置。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">凌琦和邢菲吓了一跳。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">凌琦道：“颜苟儿，你、你什么时候回来的？你没听到我们说什么吧？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">邢菲补充道：“颜苟儿，那个什么，我跟凌琦也没别的意思，就是觉得我们毕竟是帝京电影学院的学生，就算再不挑，也该演正经导演导的片子，不能给咱学校丢人啊，你说是不是？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">凌琦也道：“是啊颜苟儿，我们也是为了你好啊，真没恶意！我们是帝影人，这三个字就胜过了一切，总该有些坚守的呀。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿酥胸起伏，贝齿轻咬，一双粉拳已经悄然捏了起来。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">即便是面对那些恶毒的流言、诋毁和猜测，她也从未有过如此强烈情绪起伏，但对于邢菲和凌琦看似好意的劝告，她却由衷的生气了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">她终于体会到了汪红那种愤怒、无力的感觉。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">她很想跟凌琦和邢菲大吵一架：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">你们懂什么？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">你们这些娇生惯养、家境优渥、生来就享受着优于别人的条件的少爷小姐懂什么？！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">你知道你口中一个轻飘飘的“就算再不挑”，在我们看来是有多么难做到的事情吗？如果有机会谁不想要出演名导的电影，谁不想要挑最好的资源？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">可是我们有的挑吗？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">我们没得挑！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">凭什么你们抢走了一切机会，占尽了一切好处，还要站在道德的高低来批判我们？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">还要你们来告诉我们选择错了？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">凭什么？！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿深吸了一口气，强令自己冷静了下来。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">弱小者的愤怒，在强者眼里，不过是取乐的玩笑。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿坐了下来，翻开书，淡淡道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“那就让事实说话好了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“什么？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">凌琦没有听清。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">邢菲听清了却显得惊愕。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿没有再回答，静静的看起了书。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">阳光透过窗户，斑驳地洒在她的脸上，她的眼睛清澈明亮，雪嫩的肌肤如同精致的瓷器，微微抿着的嘴唇，带着一抹坚毅与果决。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">十月一号。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">首映当日。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">全国瞩目。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">今天，一共有四部电影上映，其中有三部大导演大制作的影片，在首映日前就有媒体造势，称这是近年来最强国庆档。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">不但有国内三大导演之一的吕卓峰，还有近年来风头正盛的椰果芒芒的当家一哥一姐，以及老牌国际女打星蔡文兰，绝对是一番龙争虎斗。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">《辉煌时代》、《战火》、《搞笑路现》各主创团队在昨日就接受了采访，皆宣称，对手只在另外两家。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">《孤注一掷》似乎被有意无意的无视了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">一大早，第一批观众就已经来到电影院。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">售票台前。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“我们看什么？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“《搞笑路现》吧，正好放假，不想接受教育了，先看点轻松的。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“嗯？你不是看成丞直播的时候说要去看《孤注一掷》吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“我就说着玩的，你还当真啊？谁的钱也不是大风刮来的，我就逗逗他，谁真去看《孤注一掷》啊，那不傻逼嘛！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“哈哈哈哈，那确实，看乐子还可以，真花钱还是算了，《搞笑路现》不错，椰果芒芒的电影，闭着眼冲。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“嗯，我去买票，你去买两瓶水，要是等下还有时间，就再从《辉煌时代》和《战火》里选一部。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“可以，吕卓峰虽然这几年不行了，但他的电影还是有保证的，烂也不会烂到哪去。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">小黑子群。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“我已经买票了，下午一点二十场的。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“我也买了，买了两张，打算跟女朋友一块去，她要是有意见，我就跟她分手！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“兄弟真男人！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“羡慕伱们，我特么今天还在加班，只能晚上再去支持蛙哥了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“不管蛙哥拍得怎么样必须去支持一张！一张电影票怎么了！冲！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“冲！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">看着群里小黑子们的发言，成丞有些感动，小黑子们是真靠得住，有事是真上啊！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">在群内发言，感谢了一番小黑子后，成丞从系统物品栏里取出了好运药水，选择了使用。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">此时此刻，颜苟儿、温莲、李阳、齐昊、贝雷帽、那里全露，全都在关注着《孤注一掷》的实时票房。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">决定命运的时刻到了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">是闯出一条生路，还是覆灭全部的希望，就看今天了！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">伤时是B站的一名影视区UP主，一大早，他就来到附近的电影院，等待着入场。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但在临近《辉煌时代》开场前半个小时，影院的工作人员突然宣布了一个意外状况：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">因技术故障的原因，《辉煌时代》的片源出现问题，《辉煌时代》播不了了！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">现场顿时响起阵阵骂声。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">伤时冲到售票台前，问：“什么时候能看，我都已经买好电影票了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">售票员很遗憾的说道：“这位先生，目前我们也无法确定具体的恢复时间。对于这次突发的技术问题，我们深感抱歉。请放心，我们已经紧急与片方取得了联系，并会全力以赴地解决这一问题，以期尽快恢复电影的播放。同时，对于已经购买本场电影票的观众，我们将提供全额退票服务。作为对您不便的补偿，下次您来购买电影票时，我们将为您在原票价的基础上提供五折优惠。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">伤时没耐心听她说的这一长串，直接问道：“那《战火》呢？《战火》有最近的场次吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">售票员刚要回答，突然听到了耳麦里传来的声音，半晌，她说道：“抱歉，《战火》也暂时看不了了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">伤时继续问：“那《搞笑路现》呢？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">耳麦里再次传来声音，售票员苦笑道：“《搞笑路现》也出问题了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">伤时古怪道：“你别说现在只剩下《孤注一掷》了！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“您稍等一下。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">售票员走到旁边，通过耳麦跟技术人员沟通了片刻后，她重新回到收票台前，略微可怜的说道：“好像还真只剩下《孤注一掷》了，您要看吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">伤时嘴唇蠕动，心里已经骂开了：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他妈的，什么鬼玩意儿？！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">《辉煌时代》、《战火》、《搞笑路现》全不能看，就剩下了一个最烂的《孤注一掷》，你他妈的搞笑呢？！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">售票员弱弱的说道：“先生，要不您直接退票，或者去附近的电影院看看？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">伤时放弃了挣扎：“算了，给我来一张最近的《孤注一掷》的电影票吧。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">反正看啥都是看，他本来的计划是先看《辉煌时代》的，然后《战火》、《搞笑路现》一路扫过去，做个国庆档特辑，《孤注一掷》可看可不看。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">既然是这样，那就先锐评一下《孤注一掷》好了！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞，你别怪我，这可是你自己送上门来的！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">此时，全国各地有不少影院出现了这样的情况，当然，这样的影院并不多，大概一百家影院里只有一两家，而且还都是国内第一大院线全洲旗下的。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">如果是万斯影业出现的问题，还会有人怀疑是不是姜望故意为之，但若是全洲，就不会有人作此想了！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">因为三部电影里，有两部电影就是全洲投资的。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">谁他妈会坏自己的生意？！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">吕卓峰气得跳脚，连脸上的皱纹都飞起来了：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“全洲怎么搞的！赶紧给他们打电话，我要在中午十二点之前看到他们把问题解决掉！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">此时此刻，另外两家也一阵兵荒马乱，急得跟热锅上的蚂蚁一样。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他们不懂，全洲做院线做这么多年了！怎么还会犯这种低级错误？！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">虽然出现问题的影院数量不多，但影响却是不容小觑的！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">尤其是在电影首映日，每分每秒都至关重要，这不仅关系到首映日的票房，更关系到电影未来的走势，甚至可能影响到他们能否打破票房纪录！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但不幸中的万幸是，这次出问题是三家一起出问题，没有被另外两家占了便宜。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">咦！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这似乎是一个机会啊！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">想通了这一层，战火的导演打给他在全洲影业相熟的一个高层：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“麻总，可不可以帮帮忙，优先恢复《战火》的上映，《辉煌时代》和《搞笑路现》自然越慢越好，我不让您白帮，你之前看上的那个小鲜肉”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">上午十点钟，伤时和一批“被迫”的观众进到了《孤注一掷》的放映厅。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">在黑暗中找到了自己的位置，伤时坐了下来，等待着广告时间结束、电影开始。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这个突如其来的技术问题完全打乱了他的计划，也让他失去了上传视频、跟粉丝分享的黄金时间。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">对于他这样的影视区UP主来说，时间就是金钱。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">好在，“《战火》、《辉煌时代》、《搞笑路现》都不能看，只有《孤注一掷》能看”的噱头弥补了这一点。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他都已经想好脚本了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">到时候视频发上去，估计弹幕会是一水的“你好惨但我好想笑”、“默哀”、“同情”、“可怜”……<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">只是，看着周围完全不抱期待的观众们，伤时心中不禁泛起一丝同情：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">我是来做电影测评的，不管电影多烂都有钱赚，你们是来做什么的吗？来吃屎的吗？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">在粉丝群里发了个消息，说自己来看《孤注一掷》了，伤时关掉了手机。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">不一会儿，广告结束，电影开始了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">影厅瞬间安静下来，不管是不是对这个电影抱有期待，但大家都还挺有素质的，静静的等待着剧情展开。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“1955年，塞国有一个答题节目，从一塞分到一亿塞元的问答，观众可以根据答案下注，当时的技术有限，无法完成全国的同步直播，于是有人利用时间差，操纵所谓的内幕消息，调整赔率，数学家马哈古顿以此为模型，提出了著名的古顿公式，让投注的利润最大化，你们以为对赌的是庄家，其实真正的对手是xxx、xxx、xx、xxxx这些数学大师……”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">随着她的演讲，身后的屏幕上随之出现对应的图片和内容。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“上来就给我看这个？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“不知道的还以为看的是教育片呢！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“这味儿太冲了，一股子任务片的味道。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">基于对这部电影先入为主的“不看好”，还没进入到正片，伤时就已经开始吐槽上了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他现在可谓是看什么都不爽！看什么都觉得不对！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">完全就是奔着挑刺来的。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他的期待随之调的更低。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">很快，中年女人的演讲结束了，引出来了本片的主人公：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“他叫潘生，华京科技大学计算机硕士，网络安全高手，他利用点石基金业务系统的漏洞，批量插入代码，往八万多个账户里分别存了一分钱，那一年，他刚满二十岁，像他这样天才的程序员，同样也会被骗，甚至为境外的诈骗集团卖过命。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“接下来我要讲的，才是真正的内幕消息。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“很平庸的开头。”，伤时评价道，他很讨厌这种引导式的开头，一点技术含量都没有。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">中年女人的话音一落，音乐声响起，片头像是走马灯一样，闪过了充斥着筹码、转盘、扑克、钞票、武警、窝点、突袭、抓获、落网等元素的镜头。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">伤时抬了抬眉：这里的配乐和镜头倒是有点意思，但意思不多。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">随后，镜头转到了李阳饰演的潘生身上，也即是这部电影的主角，整部电影似乎进入了另一个世界。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">引出主角，潘生。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">潘生参加升职大会。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">自信满满却被富二代截胡。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">甩下工牌当场离职。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">打开电脑，切入后台程序，种下木马，升职大会的屏幕上出现了各种搞怪的表情。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">走出公司大楼，潇洒离去。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“萤火”这个披着“新加坡游戏公司皮”的诈骗园区也揭开了一角神秘的面纱。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">此时，影厅里已经响起了阵阵讶异的声音。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">李阳演技不错，甚至说出乎意料的好！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">而且电影的节奏也相当的棒，短短几分钟，没有一句废话，没有一个废镜头，不但交代清楚了事情经过，还塑造了潘生的人物形象。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">伤时似乎已经感觉到事情有些不对劲了，他喃喃道：“再看看，再看看。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">接着，镜头一转，潘生已经出现在了出国的飞机上。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">由齐昊饰演的诈骗园区二号人物“阿才”出现，他带着一副眼镜，头发束在脑后，穿着一条蓝色的衬衫，看起来有种斯文败类的感觉。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“不好意思，打扰一下，加入萤火的新同事们可以举个手吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">飞机仓内竖起一片手。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">阿才解释：“我确实在潭州出生的，但六岁就跟家人去新海线了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">潘生：“哦，我是莲城人，我以为我们是老乡。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">旁边的人发笑：“伱也读一下我噻？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">接着，他没有停，指着机舱里的人，一个个点了过去：“王小川，朱丽雨、陆行——”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">阿才笑着问：“你是不是黑了航空公司的网站？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“不用啊！”，潘生直率的答道，“黑掉你手机就可以了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">阿才表情僵硬了片刻，隐忍的笑了出来，称赞道：“人才。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">短暂的交锋结束。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">潘生以及一同被骗来的人走出机场，好奇打量着异国风光：在机场配枪的警察、与国内完全不同的建筑风格、沿街招揽客人的小姐、热带植物.<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">潘生跟母亲打电话，落单在后面。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">阿才察觉出现意外，反过头来追，潘生意识到不对，仓皇逃窜。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">转变突如其来，潜藏在水面下的危险浮出水面，其乐融融的泡影骤然被戳破。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">影厅里观众的心吊了起来，代入到剧情中，不禁为潘生感到阵阵担忧。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">潘生疯狂奔跑，迎面撞上了骑着电动车的路人，爬起来继续跑。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">阿才蹲在地上，拍了拍潘生的脸，戏谑道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“我有两个手机啊！装聪明！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">接着，一辆面包车缓缓地驶在马路上，穿过蜿蜒的山路，开进一处门框上写有泰语的园区。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">伤时已经被震惊的说不出话来了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">等等，这真是成丞拍出来的玩意儿？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">如果这是张卓峰、龚大师、周勉等导演拍出的作品，他可能会说一声中规中矩，但是成丞？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">不会吧不会吧？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">节奏紧张刺激、人物智商在线、演员演技饱满，更遑论几个镜头，将剧情的张力完全凸显了出来！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">简直是电影教科书级别的叙事技巧！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">伤时感觉自己的大脑在震颤！世界的不合理性在这一刻突袭了他！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">而普通观众想的完全没有他多。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他们不会去从节奏、镜头、叙事技巧等方面去分析这部电影，他们看完这一段，心里只有一个念头：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">潘生被抓了，接下来会发生什么？会不会受到非人的虐待？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">在他们身后，是盯着他们一举一动的众打手。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">在他们的身前，是一个个荷枪实弹的私人武装。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他拿着一根雪糕棒，踹了阿才一脚，出现在了荧幕中。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">随着他出场，影院里出现了一片惊呼。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“窝草”之声连绵不绝。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞此刻在荧幕里的形象，头发微微卷曲，被随意地梳在脑后，戴着一副眼镜，身着一件东南亚风格的短袖衬衫，手持一根雪糕棒，仿佛是一个悠闲度日的青年，在炎炎烈日下享受着片刻的清凉。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">伤时当场陷入怀疑当中：帅哥你谁？！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞的长相曾被很多美妆博主分析过，总结出来的结论是：成丞的帅只是被营销出来的帅，单看五官的话，在内娱压根算不上顶级，甚至有很多硬伤。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">可是此时在大银幕真实的镜头下，成丞的颜简直是360度无死角的帅！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">五官精致而立体，眼睛深邃而明亮，眉毛浓密而有力，鼻子高挺而优雅，嘴唇抿成一条薄线、脸庞轮廓棱角分明，即便是在大银幕的苛刻镜头下，也没有一丝瑕疵！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">难道他整容了？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">第60章 大战继续，山猪吃不了细糠？（求追读）<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">次日，票房大战继续。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">经过了一天一夜时间的发酵，《辉煌时代》、《搞笑路现》、《战火》已经形成了初步的反响。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">《辉煌时代》口碑两级分化很严重，喜欢的人很喜欢，不喜欢的人大叫烂片。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">《搞笑路现》也遭遇了恶评。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">相比起来，《战火》反倒是最好的，起码它的故事是完整的，蔡文兰的演技也非常在线，一把年纪了，还在电影里打的非常拼命。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但是《战火》的题材注定了他叫好不叫座，或许，老牌武打影星的时代真的过去了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">——<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">某影院。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">《辉煌时代》刚散场。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">涌出的人流里，两个观众交谈。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“你觉得这部电影怎么样？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“说实话我有点看不懂，一头雾水，不知道他怎么就发展成公司了，不知道怎么就成了商会主席了，我知道他拍那一段的时候想让我爽，但我就是爽不起来。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“你是不是想说隔靴搔痒的感觉？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“对，就是隔靴搔痒啊，给我的感觉就是代入不了这个角色，光看他装逼了，而且后半段还非常的流水账，一会儿商战片，一会儿黑帮片，一会儿又变成了警匪片。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“跟我的感觉差不多，说实话，我看到一半的时候就觉得完了，本来冲吕卓峰来看这部电影的，但是没想到有点烂啊。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“上当了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">《辉煌时代》网友诟病的点主要有几个。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">一.它的剧情太满了，因为讲述的八九十年代的事情，再加上商战的戏份过多，庞大的信息量对于没有了解过背景的人，会非常吃力，太满的结果就是啥都想要说，但是啥都没说清楚。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">二.电影的节奏相当有问题的，故事是个很好的故事，人物原型的发家史非常的励志，但是吕卓峰把一个非常好的故事，剪得稀碎。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">结果就是主角发家的事零零散散，来自敌人的打压商战也是虎头蛇尾。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">而且吕卓峰在这部电影里还疯狂炫技，各种时间线交叉，很多观众看的一头雾水，甚至不知道哪件事在前，哪件事在后。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">结果就是爽点有，但是又好像没有，严肃的点也有，但好像这电影本身就不应该是严肃的。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">三、因为剧情非常散乱，所以人物是非常单薄的，吕卓峰只能加感情和亲情来试图丰满人物性格，但问题是加的这些内容让内容更散了，如果仔细看会发现感情戏和主线剧情的节奏是不一样的，一到感情戏，信息量就狂降。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">而且穿插在中间很多地方给出的信息，当你以为是伏笔的时候，后面却根本没用上。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">当然，这部电影精彩的地方也有。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">首先就是男主角的角色魅力，或者说，或者说主演的魅力，穿起了主线。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">其次就是镜头语言以及造景和电影质感。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">因为吕卓峰就是从八九十年代走过来的，所以，以八九十年代为故事背景的电影制作，不仅仅是他的舒适区，更是他的统治区！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他通过镜头，非常形象的将天夏八九十年代集体向上的社会氛围展现了出来，更还原那个时代的真实风貌，大票影迷直呼真实。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但这些东西都只是其次的，不管镜头语言再好，造景再真实，传达的信息都是无效的，它们就只是好看而已，电影爽不起来都是白搭！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">演技也是同一回事！演技是为了剧情服务，而非剧情为演技服务。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">二、万斯影业也绝对不会因为电影质量和销量之外的因素影响排片。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">她并没有过度打扮，只是简单地扎了一个马尾辫，穿着一件素净运动服，脚下踩着一双舒适的小白运动鞋。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">脸上也没有化很浓的妆容，只是微微抹了点乳液，涂了层防晒霜，就连嘴巴也只是简单的擦了些润唇膏。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但她偏生有一种清水出芙蓉，天然去雕饰之美。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颅顶高高的，马尾辫的发型将她的头型凸显的十分饱满且完美，鬓角和发际线处，还能隐约看出些许胎毛，似是还未褪去的稚嫩和可爱。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">细腻的皮肤如同瓷器般白净，樱红的嘴唇色泽健康，水润娇嫩。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">微微修身的运动服裹着她的身体，她虽没有汪红般惹火的身材，但是胸前微微鼓起的弧度，还是令她充满了女性的柔美。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">汪红挽过颜苟儿的手臂，两人一起出门。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">在食堂吃过饭后，两人来到了教室。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">此时，教室里已经坐了一半的人。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">在半个月前，颜苟儿还是众人嘲讽的对象，被视为帝京电影学院之耻，甚至有人发匿名帖子，喊话颜苟儿退学，不要脏了帝京电影学院的招牌。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">可是短短十几天过去，颜苟儿就一跻成为二十亿票房女二，并被媒体称为小白蓓、00后四小花旦，粉丝数也一夜之间突破了百万！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">可以说，单论知名度和热度，颜苟儿一出道就成为了接近二线的小花。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">从电影筹备、电影审核、电影拍摄、电影后期、电影宣发、电影上映，哪一步不是困难重重？哪一步不是奇迹？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">在电影筹备阶段，成丞导演掏空了全部身家，甚至是卖掉了房子，赌上了一切来拍电影；在电影拍摄阶段，他展现了出了顶级导演才具备的才华，将一切安排的井井有条，顺利拍完了电影。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">在电影后期阶段，他一人包揽所有工作，剪辑是他来，配乐是他来，主题曲是他来，不眠不休，八天就完成了剪辑；<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">在电影宣发阶段，遭遇突如其来的提档，在其他人都束手无策的时候，又是他开启了直播间，为了宣传电影唱歌、表演魔术、写小说、演小品，有人骂他，他唾面自干，有人耍他，他当做不知道，只为了换大家一个国庆档去看《孤注一掷》的承诺。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">在电影上映阶段，又是他凭借着炸裂的演技，多次出圈，扛起来票房。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞每次都以奇迹般的手段力挽狂澜。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">也正是这层出不穷的奇迹，才造就了颜苟儿今天的爆红。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">半个小时后，当成丞出现在现场时，众人看他的眼神充满了怨念：有你这样对话的吗？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿也有点小幽怨，心里很不爽。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">但她很快就发现了情绪做给了瞎子看，成丞根本察觉不到，于是只能无奈收起了情绪，跟在成丞身边问东问西。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">不一会儿，直播开始了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">今天的直播是万斯影业和抖音平台联合举办的，邀请了不少知名媒体记者、网红和博主等到场，现场聚集了约百十人<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞、温莲、李阳、颜苟儿等人在工作人员的安排下站在了台上，面向观众。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">从次序上就可以看出来众人在剧组的身份咖位，成丞是无可争议的C位，他身边站着李阳和贝雷帽，再外围是温莲、齐昊、颜苟儿和孟才.<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">背后的大屏幕上，带有《孤注一掷》、成丞等字样，并放着《孤注一掷》全员恶人版海报。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">直播间已经开启，因为提前宣传到位，不但五分钟，就涌进来一百多万人，并且还在持续上涨中。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">现场嘉宾提问的问题，有些是提前准备好的，有些则是现场临时想到的。与此同时，主持人也会根据直播间呼声比较高的问题，向成丞等人提问。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">一开始提问的问题还好，都集中在电影创作方面，比如电影的灵感来源、剧本创作中有什么困难、电影制作周期是不是真的只有48天、选角的角度以及为什么挑选颜苟儿、温莲、李阳等人、成丞对他们是否满意等等。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">现场的气氛瞬间凝固，仿佛连空气都停止了流动。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">台下嘉宾们面面相觑，主持人则是一脸惊愕，仿佛不敢相信自己的耳朵。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿、李阳、齐昊等人也有些懵逼：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成导的展开总让他们措不及防！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">只有温莲还好，因为这话成丞已经跟她说起过一次了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">直播间的弹幕上，一条醒目的消息跳了出来：【啊？】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这个字眼很简单，却准确地表达了所有人的惊讶和疑惑，吕卓峰是娱乐圈的巨头，势力庞大，成丞竟然敢说要封杀他，这简直就像是天方夜谭。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">问题是你凭什么封杀他啊？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">就凭着你刚翻红的身份吗？还是获得票冠的《孤注一掷》？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">可就算你暂时压过吕卓峰一头，也说明不了什么啊，要知道，吕卓峰获得票冠的次数，那简直数不胜数！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">你真的不是在开玩笑吗？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞不理会众人的惊讶，他道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“我不屑跟吕卓峰玩阴的，他怎么对付过我，他心里有数！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">我也不是自打自脸，前脚抨击他的封杀行为，后脚自己也有样学样的封杀。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">我不会跟他一样，我是堂堂正正的封杀他！以后，他上映一部电影，我就上映一部电影，狙击他，让他永远拿不到票房冠军！除此之外——”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞从裤兜里掏出一张折好的纸，展开说道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“这张封杀名单里还有祥华娱乐、芳华美肌、雅致化妆品、昆山啤酒.以后，我不会参演任何名单里投资的电影电视剧综艺，不接受任何合作！，不接受任何和解！”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">现场晕了！<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">你丫的，你到底是在封杀吕卓峰啊！还是封杀自己啊？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">你知道当下国民级综艺有多少都是他们投资的吗？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">你这不是堵了自己的路吗？<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">弹幕也晕了：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【成丞太冲动了，这样做只会让自己陷入困境吧？】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【第一次见封杀自己的】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【不是，你前面说的慷慨激昂，就是为了这么一出？】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【我败了，我真是无法理解精神病人的脑回路】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【我允许你重新组织措辞】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【我特么竟然看精神病人的直播看的这么认真！】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【醉了，你以后不上综艺了吗？】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【敌人快笑晕了】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【我懂了，成丞这是想让对方笑死！以这样的方式来达成自己的目的，好歹毒！】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【蛙哥，要不咱们还是再治疗一段时间吧？】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【加大药量！】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“好了，这个问题我已经回答完了，你可以坐下了。”，成丞着对仍站着的嘉宾说道，那位嘉宾这才如梦初醒，从成丞说话开始，他就一直处于震惊状态当中，连坐下都忘了。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞的话音刚落，更多的嘉宾纷纷站了起来，仿佛怕错过这个难得的机会，疯狂地向成丞发问:<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“成丞，你真的要封杀那些人吗？不怕得罪他们吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“成丞，你觉得自己能成功吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“成丞，你不觉得你这么做很愚蠢吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“成丞，你的意思是接下来还会拍电影吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“成丞，你现在有什么电影拍摄计划？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">问题纷至沓来，成丞打了个哈欠，说道：“我困了，要躺一会儿，你们别再问我了，问其他人吧。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">主持人连忙起身，问道：“成导，您要提前回去休息吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">虽然有点不符合规矩，但主持人莫名松了一口气：总算把这个瘟神送走了！虽然怒怼吕卓峰的是成丞，但他也怕被殃及池鱼。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“啊？”，成丞回以疑惑的表情，坦然道，“我不回去啊，我在这里躺一下就行。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">说着，在现场所有人的注视下，在直播间几千万网友的众目睽睽中，成丞站起身来。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">他先将靠枕放在地面上，调整到一个舒适的角度，接着，他从口袋里掏出了眼罩，熟练地戴好，遮挡住了外界的光线，然后，他双手叠放在了小腹处，身体完全放松，躺在了地上。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">成丞的姿势笔直，是标准到挑不出一丝错处的睡眠姿势，仿佛一个训练有素的士兵在休息。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">现场的气氛瞬间变得有些诡异，嘉宾们面面相觑，后台工作人员一片哗然，主持人张大了嘴巴。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">在直播间的弹幕上，观众的评论更是疯狂滚动：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【？？？】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【这是什么操作？】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【成丞这是要睡觉吗？】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【这也太夸张了吧，竟然在这种场合下睡觉？】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【行为艺术！】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【我想问，他为什么会随身带眼罩啊喂！！！】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【主持人人已经傻了】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【这一刻，主持人的专业水平受到了前所未有的挑战】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【别说主持人了，我他妈都已经傻了！】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【主持人的表情：(ΩДΩ)】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【就是这个人拍出了《孤注一掷》？】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【地上一躺，谁也不爱；眼罩一戴，直接开摆】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【令人羡慕的精神状态】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【笑死爹了，这睡觉的姿势明明很正常，为什么我好想笑啊】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【真是老奶奶换姿势，给爷整不会了】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">无论众人如何惊讶和不解，成丞却仿佛进入了一个完全属于自己的世界，他的呼吸均匀而平缓，仿佛真的进入了梦乡。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">第68章 直播结束，娱乐圈地震<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">主持人向贝雷帽等人发出了求救的信号：“成导这——”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">贝雷帽嘴角抽搐，道：“没事，我们接着聊我们的就行。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">主持人汗流浃背道：“真的不用管吗？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">贝雷帽歉意道：“真的不用管。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿看着躺着板正的成丞，眼底闪过一抹温柔道：“如果可以的话，可以小声一点，成导一定是累了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">看着他俩的反应，直播间观众已经叫开了：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【为什么你们那么习以为常啊？】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【颜苟儿甚至让我们小声一点】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【她好温柔，我哭死】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【太抽象了，让我大开眼界】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【成丞内娱无代餐】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">【废话！因为别的明星没有病啊！】<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">主持人咽了一口唾沫，试着问：“那我们继续？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">贝雷帽道：“继续吧。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">台下嘉宾也有些发愣，终于有了一个人率先站了起来，她问道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“颜苟儿老师，我想请问你第一次出道就大火，是什么样的感受？未来会考虑什么样的发展方向？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿接过话筒，有些紧张的说道：<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">“嗯，首先我第一感受是幸运吧~是各种奇迹的造就，才使得《孤注一掷》能够被大家看到，我饰演的宋雨能被大家看到。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">首先是感谢成丞导演选了我，如果没有成导，我就不会站在这里；其次是剧本足够精彩，大家都喜欢；还有温莲姐、李阳哥、齐昊哥、孟才哥等资深演员的演绎，让每个人物都有血有肉，以及大家在剧组里对我像妹妹一样的关爱，和传授经验，还有成导和岛导对我演技上教导.”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">这时，贝雷帽插嘴道：“我觉得小颜这里也应该要感谢一下自己的勇敢。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">主持人：“哦？怎么说？”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">贝雷帽道：“众所周知嘛，我们的选角是面向全社会选角的，当时我们面临了很多质疑，很多演员不愿意来，也不可能来，在这种情况下，小颜来了，我觉得她是足够勇敢的，她最需要感谢地就是她自己。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">颜苟儿脸红了红，道：“其实当时我也是抱着试一试的态度，没想到还真的选上了。”<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">接下来，嘉宾还问了很多问题，比如“温莲在跟成丞对戏的时候害不害怕”、“李阳如何看待网友说他在电影中被打满了一整集”、“剧组拍摄时有什么趣事没有”。<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
